definition: to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: For whoever does the will of myFather in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.
sentences.chinese: 凡遵行我天父旨意的人，就是我的弟兄姐妹和母親了。

sentences.english: He forsook the Lord , the God of his fathers, and did not walk in the way of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 離棄耶和華他列祖的神，不遵行耶和華的道。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who obey the Lord's words.
sentences.chinese: 遵行主道的人是有福的。

sentences.english: They do nothing wrong; they walk in his ways.
sentences.chinese: 這人不做非義的事，但遵行他的道。

sentences.english: My heart is set on keeping your decrees to the very end.
sentences.chinese: 我的心專向你的律例，永遠遵行，一直到底。

sentences.english: Keep my commands and follow them.
sentences.chinese: 你們要謹守遵行我的誡命。

sentences.english: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.
sentences.chinese: 就是那些遵守他的約，記念他的訓詞而遵行的人。

sentences.english: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 行爲完全，遵行耶和華律法的，這人便爲有福。

sentences.english: The Mediterranean diet is a diet followed by many nations in the Mediterranean Sea region.
sentences.chinese: 在整個地中海地區，許多國家都遵行着地中海式飲食。

sentences.english: How can a young man keep his way pure?
sentences.chinese: 少年人用甚麼潔淨他的行爲呢？是要遵行你的話。

sentences.english: Follow the instructions given in the chapter on FAITH.
sentences.chinese: 遵行講述信心那一章所給你的建議。

sentences.english: And the inhabitants of Jerusalem did according to the covenant of God, the God of their fathers.
sentences.chinese: 於是耶路撒冷的居民都遵行他們列祖之神的約。

sentences.english: I Darius have made a decree; let it be done with speed.
sentences.chinese: 我大流士降這旨意，當速速遵行。

sentences.english: I wait for your salvation, O Lord , and I follow your commands.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，我仰望了你的救恩，遵行了你的命令。

sentences.english: The tithing system was ordained by God, and it had been observed from the earliest times.
sentences.chinese: 十分之一的制度是上帝所訂的，從古時就被人遵行。

sentences.english: He obeyed God perfectly. He laid down his life in obedience to his Father.
sentences.chinese: 祂完全地遵行上帝的旨意，在順服中舍了祂的生命。

definition: to maintain/to adhere to/to observe (an injunction etc)
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
